text: James Frederick Rodgers (September 18, 1933 â€“ January 18, 2021) was an American folk pop singer. He was popular in the 1950s and 1960s. He was known for his singles "Honeycomb", "Kisses Sweeter than Wine" and "Secretly". Rodgers died on January 18, 2021 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American rock guitarists Category:American country guitarists Category:American folk musicians Category:American folk singers Category:American rock singers Category:American country singers Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Washington Category:Singers from Washington (state)
title: Jimmie Rodgers (pop singer)
